author: akv
msg: moved the howto to the right place. added a couple of thigns to the classpath
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'TOMCAT_30'.

author: costin
msg: - load .tomcatrc - you can set JAVA_HOME, JAVACMD ( -verbose, etc),
- if no server.xml or parameters, cd TOMCAT_HOME ( so you can run
- follow symbolic links and find TOMCAT_HOME - usefull if you create
a link in /usr/local/bin or ~/bin ( same code as in ant )
- added run option - usefull when debugging ( doesn't put tomcat in background)
- added env option - use it with "source tomcat.sh env"
